meanings.definition: Having a strong, unpleasant odor resembling that of a skunk.
meanings.sent1: The skunky smell in the room made everyone wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent2: The garbage had a skunky odor that lingered in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The skunky perfume she wore was so strong, it chased away the bees!
meanings.sent4: The skunky stench of failure filled the air after the disastrous experiment.
meanings.sent5: The skunky aroma of rotten eggs filled the entire house.

meanings.definition: Of poor quality or character; unpleasant or offensive.
meanings.sent1: The skunky movie we watched last night was a waste of time.
meanings.sent2: The food at the restaurant was so skunky that we couldn't finish it.
meanings.sent3: His skunky attitude ruined the mood at the party.
meanings.sent4: The skunky behavior of the bullies made the school a difficult place.
meanings.sent5: The skunky painting in the art gallery received no praise from the visitors.
